name: Bountiful Angel
flavor: Her light brings salvation to her allies and strikes fear in the hearts of her enemies.
ability: [AUTO] At the end of the turn, if two or more of your other creatures attacked during this turn, draw a card.

name: Sunscale Sage
flavor: He watches as another age of war grips Praelis.

name: Goldleaf Hunter
flavor: Elves are skilled in archery, but the Goldleaf are true experts.

name: Althaine's Blessing
flavor: Those who have excelled in their service to the Holy Lord are honored, and their names are remembered forever.
ability:
Choose a creature, and it gets +2/+2 for this turn.
(Yellow)Choose up to two creatures instead.
(Yellow)Then, you may draw a card.

name: Shield of Logres
flavor: The sight of their nation's sigil is enough to rally the soldiers of Logres.

name: Ravian, Battlefield Shrieker
flavor: A cacophony of explosions and shrieking laughter follows wherever she flies.
ability:
Ambush[2] (You may pay 2 to play this card from your hand face-down at one of your forts.)
[AUTO] When a creature at this fort is destroyed during your opponent's turn, if this card is an ambush, you may summon this creature, and deal 2 damage to all opposing creatures.

name: Goblin Madcap
flavor: "Magical shields? What're those?" he cackles.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is destroyed, you may choose a [Dragoshield], and deal 3 damage to it.

name: Bladedance Rogue
flavor: "Too slow!"

name: Goblin Toestabber
flavor: He'll go for your knees if he can reach them.
ability:
[AUTO] When this creature is summoned, you may choose a [Dragoshield], and deal 1 damage to it.
[CONT] [Dragocross](Black)This creature gets +1/+1.

name: Pyroblast
flavor: Precision does not exist in a goblin's lexicon.
ability:
Ambush[2] (You may pay 2 to play this card from your hand face-down at one of your forts.)
[AUTO] When this fort is attacked, if this card is an ambush, you may choose a fort, and deal X damage to all creatures at that fort, where X is the value of one of your red dice. (Put this card into your discard pile afterwards.)

name: Standard of Tauris
flavor: Only the strongest warriors are given the honor of being flagbearers of Tauris.

name: Lady Valistra, Bloodlines Tormented
flavor: Her immense powers are far beyond her own control.
ability:
[AUTO] When this creature destroys a creature in battle, you may choose an opposing creature with the same color as that creature, and destroy it.
[CONT] [Dragocross](Black)This creature must be blocked if able.

name: Undying Executioner
flavor: Everybody dies. Some could use his help.
ability: Deadly (When this creature deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature.)

name: Cavalier Nosferatu
flavor: All lesser beings exist to sate his hunger.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, you may choose a creature from your discard pile, and return it to your hand. If you do, discard a card from your hand.

name: Crowd Surfer
flavor: Fans are a little disgusted whenever he does this.
ability: [Fort Burst] Summon this creature. (Fort Burst: When this card is a barrier, and would be put to your hand due to damage, you may play this ability instead.)

name: Death Metal Rotter
flavor: He wants to one day be a legendary rock zombie that everyone remembers.

name: Carbuncle Imp
flavor: Small enough to get right under your guard.

name: Wandering Apparition
flavor: Cursed to haunt the world, tormented by regret.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is blocked by a [Dragoshield], it gets +2/+0 for this turn.

name: Death Trap
flavor: Watch your step.
ability:
Ambush[2] (You may pay 2 to play this card from your hand face-down at one of your forts.)
[AUTO] When this fort is attacked, if this card is an ambush, you may choose an attacking creature, and destroy it. (Put this card into your discard pile afterwards.)

name: Adraste's Disdain
flavor: "You're annoying, so you'll have to go~"
ability:
Choose a [Dragocross](Any)creature, and destroy it.
(Black)Then, if a creature was destroyed with this effect, you may choose a [Dragoshield], and destroy it.

name: Curse of Niflheim
flavor: A foreboding omen that can be seen throughout Niflheim.
